sqls.sql: select distinct "商品分類" as value, substr("商品分類",4) as text from "NEW_出品マスタ情報" order by "商品分類"

select TEMP."データ種別" as importtype, TEMP."基準日時" as basetime from ( select T."データ種別", T."導入日時", T."基準日時", T."導入件数", ROW_NUMBER() OVER(partition BY T."データ種別" ORDER BY T."導入日時" DESC) NB from "データ導入履歴" T where T."店舗名" = :shop ) TEMP where NB = 1

SELECT V_MST."req_no" , V_MST."subpq" , V_MST."subcq" , V_MST."sizeindex" , V_MST."商品分類" as productdiv , V_MST."商品管理番号" as productno , V_MST."商品種別" as productkinds , V_MST."色" as color , V_MST."サイズ" as size , V_MST."SKU番号" as sku , V_MST."ASIN番号" as asin , V_MST."ラベル番号" as label , V_MST."商品名" as productname , V_MST."価格" as price , V_STOCK."発送方式" as ship , V_STOCK."FBM在庫数量" as fbm , V_STOCK."FBA在庫数量" as fba , V_STOCK."LOCAL在庫数量" as localstock , V_STOCK."ONBOARD在庫数量" as onboard , V_STOCK."販売中在庫合計" as stockonsell , V_STOCK."予備在庫合計" as stockprepare , V_STOCK."全体在庫合計" as stockall , V_SELL."前日数量" as selled1 , V_SELL."7日間数量" as selled7 , V_SELL."30日間数量" as selled30 , V_SELL."60日間数量" as selled60 , V_SELL."90日間数量" as selled90 , ROUND( ( V_SELL."前日数量" * 0.05 + V_SELL."7日間数量" / 7 * 0.15 + V_SELL."30日間数量" / 30 * 0.3 + V_SELL."60日間数量" / 60 * 0.3 + V_SELL."90日間数量" / 90 * 0.2 ) * 7 , 2 ) as selledweek
FROM "VIEW_商品詳細情報" V_MST LEFT JOIN "VIEW_商品在庫情報" V_STOCK ON V_MST."SKU番号" = V_STOCK."SKU番号" AND V_MST."ASIN番号" = V_STOCK."ASIN番号" LEFT JOIN "VIEW_商品販売情報" V_SELL ON V_MST."SKU番号" = V_SELL."SKU番号" AND V_MST."ASIN番号" = V_SELL."ASIN番号" WHERE 1 = 1 AND (
V_MST."商品分類" = !productdivstr1 OR V_MST."商品分類" = !productdivstr2 OR V_MST."商品分類" = !productdivstr3 OR V_MST."商品分類" = !productdivstr4 OR V_MST."商品分類" = !productdivstr5 OR V_MST."商品分類" = !productdivstr6 OR V_MST."商品分類" = !productdivstr7 OR V_MST."商品分類" = !productdivstr8
)
ORDER BY V_MST."req_no"

SELECT TEMP."req_no", TEMP."商品管理番号" as productno, TEMP."商品写真" as productpic, TEMP."商品種別" as productdiv, TEMP."色" as color, CASE WHEN TEMP."商品種別" = '親商品' THEN 0 ELSE ROW_NUMBER() OVER(partition BY TEMP."商品管理番号",TEMP."商品種別",TEMP."色" ORDER BY TO_NUMBER(TEMP."req_no",'9999')) END AS sizeindex, ( SELECT count(distinct coalesce("サイズ",'')) FROM "NEW_出品マスタ情報" WHERE "商品管理番号" = TEMP."商品管理番号" AND "商品種別" = '子商品' AND coalesce("色",'') = coalesce(TEMP."色",'') AND "店舗名" = :shop ) as subcq, (SELECT count(*) FROM "NEW_出品マスタ情報" WHERE "商品管理番号" = TEMP."商品管理番号" AND "店舗名" = :shop) as subpq, TEMP."サイズ" as size, TEMP."SKU番号" as sku, TEMP."ASIN番号" as asin, TEMP."ラベル番号" as label, TEMP."商品名" as productname, TEMP."前日数量" as selled1, TEMP."7日間数量" as selled7, TEMP."30日間数量" as selled30, TEMP."60日間数量" as selled60, TEMP."90日間数量" as selled90, ROUND( (TEMP."前日数量" * 0.05 + TEMP."7日間数量"/7 * 0.15 + TEMP."30日間数量"/30 * 0.3 + TEMP."60日間数量"/60 * 0.3 + TEMP."90日間数量"/90 * 0.2) * 7, 2) as selledweek, TEMP."FBM在庫数量" as fbm, TEMP."FBA在庫数量" as fba, TEMP."LOCAL在庫数量" as localstock, TEMP."ONBOARD在庫数量" as onboard, TEMP."価格" as price, CASE WHEN TEMP."7日間数量" = 0 THEN 9999 ELSE ROUND(TEMP."在庫合計" / TEMP."7日間数量" * 7) END as onsell7, CASE WHEN TEMP."30日間数量" = 0 THEN 9999 ELSE ROUND(TEMP."在庫合計" / TEMP."30日間数量" * 30) END as onsell30, CASE WHEN TEMP."60日間数量" = 0 THEN 9999 ELSE ROUND(TEMP."在庫合計" / TEMP."60日間数量" * 60) END as onsell60, CASE WHEN TEMP."90日間数量" = 0 THEN 9999 ELSE ROUND(TEMP."在庫合計" / TEMP."90日間数量" * 90) END as onsell90, CASE WHEN TEMP."前日数量" = 0 and TEMP."7日間数量" = 0 and TEMP."30日間数量" = 0 and TEMP."60日間数量" = 0 and TEMP."90日間数量" = 0 THEN 9999 ELSE ROUND( TEMP."在庫合計" / (TEMP."前日数量" * 0.05 + TEMP."7日間数量"/7 * 0.15 + TEMP."30日間数量"/30 * 0.3 + TEMP."60日間数量"/60 * 0.3 + TEMP."90日間数量"/90 * 0.2),2) END as onsellweek, TEMP."仕入数量" as purchase FROM ( SELECT T0."req_no", T0."商品管理番号", P."商品写真", T0."商品種別", T0."色", T0."サイズ", DETAIL."出品者SKU" as "SKU番号", DETAIL."ASIN 1" as "ASIN番号", FBA."ラベル番号", DETAIL."商品名", COALESCE(T1."前日数量",0) as "前日数量", COALESCE(T2."7日間数量",0) as "7日間数量", COALESCE(T3."30日間数量",0) as "30日間数量", COALESCE(T4."60日間数量",0) as "60日間数量", COALESCE(T5."90日間数量",0) as "90日間数量", DETAIL."数量" AS "FBM在庫数量", FBA."在庫数量" AS "FBA在庫数量", STOCK."LOCAL在庫数量" AS "LOCAL在庫数量", STOCK."ONBOARD在庫数量" AS "ONBOARD在庫数量", DETAIL."価格", COALESCE(TO_NUMBER(DETAIL."数量",'9999'),0) + COALESCE(TO_NUMBER(FBA."在庫数量",'9999'),0) AS "在庫合計", PCD."数量" as "仕入数量" FROM "INPUT_出品詳細情報" DETAIL LEFT JOIN "NEW_出品マスタ情報" T0 ON DETAIL."出品者SKU" = T0."SKU番号" AND DETAIL."ASIN 1" = T0."ASIN番号" LEFT JOIN "INPUT_FBA在庫情報" FBA ON DETAIL."出品者SKU" = FBA."SKU番号" AND DETAIL."ASIN 1" = FBA."ASIN番号" AND FBA."販売可否状態" = 'SELLABLE' LEFT JOIN "NEW_在庫情報" STOCK ON DETAIL."出品者SKU" = STOCK."SKU番号" AND DETAIL."ASIN 1" = STOCK."ASIN番号" LEFT JOIN "MASTER_写真情報" P ON P."商品管理番号" = T0."商品管理番号" AND P."色" = coalesce(T0."色",'') AND P."店舗名" = T0."店舗名" LEFT JOIN ( SELECT T."SKU番号", T."ASIN番号", SUM(TO_NUMBER(T."数量",'9999')) as "前日数量" FROM "INPUT_注文情報" T WHERE T."販売方" = 'Amazon.co.jp' AND T."店舗名" = :shop AND substring(T.注文日時,1,10) = TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(:basedate_order,'yyyy-mm-dd')-interval '1 day','yyyy-mm-dd') GROUP BY T."SKU番号", T."ASIN番号" ) T1 ON DETAIL."出品者SKU" = T1."SKU番号" AND DETAIL."ASIN 1" = T1."ASIN番号" LEFT JOIN ( SELECT T."SKU番号", T."ASIN番号", SUM(TO_NUMBER(T."数量",'9999')) as "7日間数量" FROM "INPUT_注文情報" T WHERE T."販売方" = 'Amazon.co.jp' AND T."店舗名" = :shop AND substring(T.注文日時,1,10) >= TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(:basedate_order,'yyyy-mm-dd')-interval '7 day','yyyy-mm-dd') GROUP BY T."SKU番号", T."ASIN番号" ) T2 ON DETAIL."出品者SKU" = T2."SKU番号" AND DETAIL."ASIN 1" = T2."ASIN番号" LEFT JOIN ( SELECT T."SKU番号", T."ASIN番号", SUM(TO_NUMBER(T."数量",'9999')) as "30日間数量" FROM "INPUT_注文情報" T WHERE T."販売方" = 'Amazon.co.jp' AND T."店舗名" = :shop AND substring(T.注文日時,1,10) >= TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(:basedate_order,'yyyy-mm-dd')-interval '30 day','yyyy-mm-dd') GROUP BY T."SKU番号", T."ASIN番号" ) T3 ON DETAIL."出品者SKU" = T3."SKU番号" AND DETAIL."ASIN 1" = T3."ASIN番号" LEFT JOIN ( SELECT T."SKU番号", T."ASIN番号", SUM(TO_NUMBER(T."数量",'9999')) as "60日間数量" FROM "INPUT_注文情報" T WHERE T."販売方" = 'Amazon.co.jp' AND T."店舗名" = :shop AND substring(T.注文日時,1,10) >= TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(:basedate_order,'yyyy-mm-dd')-interval '60 day','yyyy-mm-dd') GROUP BY T."SKU番号", T."ASIN番号" ) T4 ON DETAIL."出品者SKU" = T4."SKU番号" AND DETAIL."ASIN 1" = T4."ASIN番号" LEFT JOIN ( SELECT T."SKU番号", T."ASIN番号", SUM(TO_NUMBER(T."数量",'9999')) as "90日間数量" FROM "INPUT_注文情報" T WHERE T."販売方" = 'Amazon.co.jp' AND T."店舗名" = :shop AND substring(T.注文日時,1,10) >= TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(:basedate_order,'yyyy-mm-dd')-interval '90 day','yyyy-mm-dd') GROUP BY T."SKU番号", T."ASIN番号" ) T5 ON DETAIL."出品者SKU" = T5."SKU番号" AND DETAIL."ASIN 1" = T5."ASIN番号" LEFT JOIN "仕入明細" PCD ON DETAIL."出品者SKU" = PCD."SKU番号" AND DETAIL."ASIN 1" = PCD."ASIN番号" AND PCD."仕入NO" = :purchaseno WHERE DETAIL."店舗名" = :shop ) TEMP ORDER BY TO_NUMBER(TEMP."req_no",'9999')

SELECT TEMP."req_no", TEMP."商品管理番号" as productno, TEMP."商品写真" as productpic, TEMP."商品種別" as productdiv, TEMP."色" as color, CASE WHEN TEMP."商品種別" = '親商品' THEN 0 ELSE ROW_NUMBER() OVER(partition BY TEMP."商品管理番号",TEMP."商品種別",TEMP."色" ORDER BY TO_NUMBER(TEMP."req_no",'9999')) END AS sizeindex, ( SELECT count(distinct coalesce("サイズ",'')) FROM "NEW_出品マスタ情報" WHERE "商品管理番号" = TEMP."商品管理番号" AND "商品種別" = '子商品' AND coalesce("色",'') = coalesce(TEMP."色",'') AND "店舗名" = :shop ) as subcq, (SELECT count(*) FROM "NEW_出品マスタ情報" WHERE "商品管理番号" = TEMP."商品管理番号" AND "店舗名" = :shop) as subpq, TEMP."サイズ" as size, TEMP."SKU番号" as sku, TEMP."ASIN番号" as asin, TEMP."ラベル番号" as label, TEMP."商品名" as productname, TEMP."前日数量" as selled1, TEMP."7日間数量" as selled7, TEMP."30日間数量" as selled30, TEMP."60日間数量" as selled60, TEMP."90日間数量" as selled90, ROUND( (TEMP."前日数量" * 0.05 + TEMP."7日間数量"/7 * 0.15 + TEMP."30日間数量"/30 * 0.3 + TEMP."60日間数量"/60 * 0.3 + TEMP."90日間数量"/90 * 0.2) * 7, 2) as selledweek, TEMP."FBM在庫数量" as fbm, TEMP."FBA在庫数量" as fba, TEMP."LOCAL在庫数量" as localstock, TEMP."ONBOARD在庫数量" as onboard, TEMP."価格" as price, CASE WHEN TEMP."7日間数量" = 0 THEN 9999 ELSE ROUND(TEMP."在庫合計" / TEMP."7日間数量" * 7) END as onsell7, CASE WHEN TEMP."30日間数量" = 0 THEN 9999 ELSE ROUND(TEMP."在庫合計" / TEMP."30日間数量" * 30) END as onsell30, CASE WHEN TEMP."60日間数量" = 0 THEN 9999 ELSE ROUND(TEMP."在庫合計" / TEMP."60日間数量" * 60) END as onsell60, CASE WHEN TEMP."90日間数量" = 0 THEN 9999 ELSE ROUND(TEMP."在庫合計" / TEMP."90日間数量" * 90) END as onsell90, CASE WHEN TEMP."前日数量" = 0 and TEMP."7日間数量" = 0 and TEMP."30日間数量" = 0 and TEMP."60日間数量" = 0 and TEMP."90日間数量" = 0 THEN 9999 ELSE ROUND( TEMP."在庫合計" / (TEMP."前日数量" * 0.05 + TEMP."7日間数量"/7 * 0.15 + TEMP."30日間数量"/30 * 0.3 + TEMP."60日間数量"/60 * 0.3 + TEMP."90日間数量"/90 * 0.2),2) END as onsellweek, TEMP."納品数量" as delivery FROM ( SELECT T0."req_no", T0."商品管理番号", P."商品写真", T0."商品種別", T0."色", T0."サイズ", DETAIL."出品者SKU" as "SKU番号", DETAIL."ASIN 1" as "ASIN番号", FBA."ラベル番号", DETAIL."商品名", COALESCE(T1."前日数量",0) as "前日数量", COALESCE(T2."7日間数量",0) as "7日間数量", COALESCE(T3."30日間数量",0) as "30日間数量", COALESCE(T4."60日間数量",0) as "60日間数量", COALESCE(T5."90日間数量",0) as "90日間数量", DETAIL."数量" AS "FBM在庫数量", FBA."在庫数量" AS "FBA在庫数量", STOCK."LOCAL在庫数量" AS "LOCAL在庫数量", STOCK."ONBOARD在庫数量" AS "ONBOARD在庫数量", DETAIL."価格", COALESCE(TO_NUMBER(DETAIL."数量",'9999'),0) + COALESCE(TO_NUMBER(FBA."在庫数量",'9999'),0) AS "在庫合計", DD."数量" as "納品数量" FROM "INPUT_出品詳細情報" DETAIL LEFT JOIN "NEW_出品マスタ情報" T0 ON DETAIL."出品者SKU" = T0."SKU番号" AND DETAIL."ASIN 1" = T0."ASIN番号" LEFT JOIN "INPUT_FBA在庫情報" FBA ON DETAIL."出品者SKU" = FBA."SKU番号" AND DETAIL."ASIN 1" = FBA."ASIN番号" AND FBA."販売可否状態" = 'SELLABLE' LEFT JOIN "NEW_在庫情報" STOCK ON DETAIL."出品者SKU" = STOCK."SKU番号" AND DETAIL."ASIN 1" = STOCK."ASIN番号" LEFT JOIN "MASTER_写真情報" P ON P."商品管理番号" = T0."商品管理番号" AND P."色" = coalesce(T0."色",'') AND P."店舗名" = T0."店舗名" LEFT JOIN ( SELECT T."SKU番号", T."ASIN番号", SUM(TO_NUMBER(T."数量",'9999')) as "前日数量" FROM "INPUT_注文情報" T WHERE T."販売方" = 'Amazon.co.jp' AND T."店舗名" = :shop AND substring(T.注文日時,1,10) = TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(:basedate_order,'yyyy-mm-dd')-interval '1 day','yyyy-mm-dd') GROUP BY T."SKU番号", T."ASIN番号" ) T1 ON DETAIL."出品者SKU" = T1."SKU番号" AND DETAIL."ASIN 1" = T1."ASIN番号" LEFT JOIN ( SELECT T."SKU番号", T."ASIN番号", SUM(TO_NUMBER(T."数量",'9999')) as "7日間数量" FROM "INPUT_注文情報" T WHERE T."販売方" = 'Amazon.co.jp' AND T."店舗名" = :shop AND substring(T.注文日時,1,10) >= TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(:basedate_order,'yyyy-mm-dd')-interval '7 day','yyyy-mm-dd') GROUP BY T."SKU番号", T."ASIN番号" ) T2 ON DETAIL."出品者SKU" = T2."SKU番号" AND DETAIL."ASIN 1" = T2."ASIN番号" LEFT JOIN ( SELECT T."SKU番号", T."ASIN番号", SUM(TO_NUMBER(T."数量",'9999')) as "30日間数量" FROM "INPUT_注文情報" T WHERE T."販売方" = 'Amazon.co.jp' AND T."店舗名" = :shop AND substring(T.注文日時,1,10) >= TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(:basedate_order,'yyyy-mm-dd')-interval '30 day','yyyy-mm-dd') GROUP BY T."SKU番号", T."ASIN番号" ) T3 ON DETAIL."出品者SKU" = T3."SKU番号" AND DETAIL."ASIN 1" = T3."ASIN番号" LEFT JOIN ( SELECT T."SKU番号", T."ASIN番号", SUM(TO_NUMBER(T."数量",'9999')) as "60日間数量" FROM "INPUT_注文情報" T WHERE T."販売方" = 'Amazon.co.jp' AND T."店舗名" = :shop AND substring(T.注文日時,1,10) >= TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(:basedate_order,'yyyy-mm-dd')-interval '60 day','yyyy-mm-dd') GROUP BY T."SKU番号", T."ASIN番号" ) T4 ON DETAIL."出品者SKU" = T4."SKU番号" AND DETAIL."ASIN 1" = T4."ASIN番号" LEFT JOIN ( SELECT T."SKU番号", T."ASIN番号", SUM(TO_NUMBER(T."数量",'9999')) as "90日間数量" FROM "INPUT_注文情報" T WHERE T."販売方" = 'Amazon.co.jp' AND T."店舗名" = :shop AND substring(T.注文日時,1,10) >= TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(:basedate_order,'yyyy-mm-dd')-interval '90 day','yyyy-mm-dd') GROUP BY T."SKU番号", T."ASIN番号" ) T5 ON DETAIL."出品者SKU" = T5."SKU番号" AND DETAIL."ASIN 1" = T5."ASIN番号" LEFT JOIN "納品明細" DD ON DETAIL."出品者SKU" = DD."SKU番号" AND DETAIL."ASIN 1" = DD."ASIN番号" AND DD."納品NO" = :deliveryno WHERE DETAIL."店舗名" = :shop ) TEMP ORDER BY TO_NUMBER(TEMP."req_no",'9999')
